long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inspired by YouTube "Dylan Is In Trouble" (https://www.youtube.com/@DylanIsInTrouble) I took it upon myself to fix the viewing experience in Disney+ and it's cumbersome Spacebar behaviour.

On its own the Spacebar can act quite unpredictably. However this Browser Extensions overrides the Spacebar behaviour and makes sure the play/stop button is clicked instead.

The source code is Open Source and can be reviewed here: https://github.com/daniellionel01/disney-plus-spacebar
